title: SuperTool
description: A versatile tool for data transformation and analysis in any data space.
dataspaceProductPurpose: To simplify data interoperability and enable advanced analytics for data space participants.
trlJustification: The tool has been successfully deployed in multiple production environments and is stable.
deploymentsInOperation: Deployed in the European Mobility Data Space.
businessOfferings: Available as a SaaS solution with enterprise support plans.
dependencies: Requires a Kubernetes cluster for deployment.
